column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Iliana - Thank you for your review. We appreciate your taking the time to give us a review. To address your main point
column2: our ramen dishes are designed in a methodical and deliberate manner that takes into account taste
column3: overall appearance and restaurant economics. Some of our bowls come with seasoned eggs and some do not. We don't offer eggs by default. That said
column4: I believe we offer additional toppings at a reasonable and competitive price. We appreciate your visit
column5: and we wish you the best.
